articles.title: 8th Conference of Munitions Industry Opens in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
8th Conference of Munitions Industry Opens in Presence of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The 8th Conference of Munitions Industry opened here with splendor on Monday.
					 The conference is set to review the achievements and experience gained in the work to implement the Party's policy on the munitions industry and discuss the measures for ushering in a heyday of development of the Juche-based defense industry under the banner of simultaneously developing the two fronts and giving full play to the invincible might of socialist Korea.
					
					 Attending it were Thae Jong Su, No Kwang Chol, Jang Chang Ha, Jon Il Ho, Hong Sung Mu and Hong Yong Chil and chairpersons of provincial party committees, contributors to the successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15 and other scientists, technicians, labor innovators and officials in the field of defense science and the munitions industry who have made significant contributions to increasing the country's defense capability, and officials and workers of relevant units.
					
					 When respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un appeared in the platform of the conference, all its participants enthusiastically welcomed him.
					
					 Thae Jong Su, Politburo member and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, stressed in a report at the conference that the DPRK's history of defense industry is a revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the WPK.
					
					 The reporter said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung created the precious tradition of building the Juche-based national defense industry in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolution in his early years. After the liberation of the country he advanced a policy of founding the independent defense industry without delay and had wisely led the struggle for its realization, making field guidance to the arsenal in Phyongchon before visiting the Kangson Steel Plant under the complicated situation of building a new country.
					
					 Kim Jong Il kept up the project for bolstering up the arms as the most important matter of the Party and the revolution and lifeline of building a socialist power and brought about a radical turn in developing the Juche-based national defense industry with his distinguished idea and energetic leadership.
					
					 The Juche-based national defense industry has now entered the fresh heyday of its development thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un set forth the strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force and provided a legal foundation for bolstering up the nuclear force. This became as a historic turning point in putting the DPRK on the position of a matchless nuclear weapons state and hastening the final victory in the showdown with the U.S. and the cause of building a powerful socialist nation.
					
					 Under his strategic decision, the DPRK carried out two successful H-bomb tests, "March 18 revolution" and "July 4 revolution" and won the miraculous July 28 victory and the great November 29 victory. These are extra-large auspicious events in the history of the nation as they opened up the era of radical changes and fully realized the long-cherished desire of our people for powerful national defense capability.
					
					 The period from the 7th Conference of Munitions Industry up to now was years of victory and glory during which world-startling rapid progress has been made to clearly prove validity and vitality of our Party's policy on strengthening the self-reliant national defense capability in every way with the nuclear force as a pivot.
					
					 Noting that the DPRK's defense industry has advanced along the road only indicated by the Party, regarding the leadership of its Central Committee as lifeline, the reporter said:
					
					 In particular, the great success in the test-fire of Hwasong-15, a new type ICBM capable of hitting the whole mainland of the U.S and carrying super-heavy warhead, conducted under the political decision and strategic resolution of the Workers' Party of Korea, is the great victory of the nation, a great event to be specially recorded in the history of the country, won by our people in the efforts to carry out the historic cause of completing the state nuclear force, the cause of building a rocket power.
					
					 The reporter mentioned the prospect of the defense industry and the tasks for carrying forward the heyday of development of the Juche-based defense industry and increasing the self-reliant defense capability in every way.
					
					 Speeches were made at the conference.
					
					 Through speeches, exchanged were achievements and good experience gained in the defense science research and the work to bolster the national defense capability over the past years, true to the Party's policy on the munitions industry. And, on this basis, discussed were the ways for making leaping progress in the development of the Juche-based defense industry.
					
					 They analyzed and reviewed intrinsic faults and lessons in the fields of defense science and munitions industry.
					
					 The conference goes on.

articles.title: Press Statement of Permanent Mission of DPRK to UN
articles.content:
Press Statement of Permanent Mission of DPRK to UN
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Permanent Mission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) to the United Nations Monday issued a press statement with regard to the forced submission and discussion of "human rights issues" of the DPRK on 11 December 2017 in the Security Council of the United Nations.
					 The press statement said:
					
					 The fictitious "human rights issues" of the DPRK were brought up and discussed again this year by the U.S. and other hostile forces in the Security Council. It is not only a disregard of the Charter of the United Nations and international law, but also an act of going against the will of the majority of Member States of the United Nations.
					
					 Abandoning its mandate for the maintenance of international peace and security and in spite of the opposition of a considerable number of its Member States, the Security Council forcibly discussed the "human rights issues" of the DPRK. That clearly proves the facts that the Security Council has been degraded to a tool controlled by the grip of the U.S. and the credibility of international community in the Security Council fell to the bottom, which gives prominence to the urgency of reforming the Security Council of the United Nations.
					
					 If the U.S and other hostile forces think of browbeating the DPRK by the discussion of "human rights issues" in the Security Council, it is nothing more than a daydream that will not be realized forever.
					
					 Their despicable plot cannot frighten the DPRK. We brand and strongly condemn the meeting as a desperate act of the hostile forces defeated in the political and military confrontation with the DPRK that has openly risen to the position of a nuclear weapon state.
					
					 The Korean people will further consolidate and develop the Korean socialist system centered on the popular masses where the human dignity has reached the highest stage.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Kenyan President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Kenyan President
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, Presidium member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Uhuru Kenyatta, president of Kenya, on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of its independence.
					 He in the message wished the Kenyan president greater success in his responsible work for stability and prosperity of the country, hoping that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Here
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Defense Ministry of Russia led by Victor Kalganov, vice-director of the National Defense Command Center of the Russian Federation, arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: Japanese Women Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japanese Women Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japanese Women's Society for the Study of the Juche Idea to learn from Kim Jong Suk led by Yoko Hayashi, member of the Shizuoka Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian Personage
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian Personage
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Senator Abudulah Adamu, chairman of the Senate Commission for Agriculture and Rural Development of Nigeria, in congratulation of the successful test-fire of the new-type ICBM Hwasong-15.
					 The gift was conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to Nigeria on Dec. 4.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Soccer Team Beats Its S. Korean Rival 1-0
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Soccer Team Beats Its S. Korean Rival 1-0
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women's soccer team defeated its south Korean rival by 1-0 at the 2017 EAFF E-1 Football Championship on Dec. 11.
					 Kim Yun Mi scored a goal in about the 18th minute of the match with a header.

articles.title: Hundreds of New Coalfaces Secured
articles.content:
Hundreds of New Coalfaces Secured
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The coal industrial sector of the DPRK has made further achievements by keeping tunneling ahead of coal-mining.
					 According to data available at the Ministry of Coal Industry, over 500 coalfaces were secured as of December 11 for increased coal production in this winter and progresses have been made in capital, preparatory and slope tunneling every day.
					
					 In this regard, Ri Kyong Chol, vice department director of the ministry, told KCNA:
					
					 Coal miners across the country are fully determined to glorify this year, a year of weighty significance in implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development, with increased production.
					
					 The Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex, a leading coal producer of the country, has provided more than 150 coalfaces, while the Pukchang Area Youth Coal Mining Complex secured 50-odd more big coalfaces, as compared with the same period of last year.
					
					 The same is true of coal mines in Tukjang, Kangdong, Kujang, Anju and Chonnae areas.

articles.title: Great Devotion Made on Blizzard-swept Road of Inspection
articles.content:
Great Devotion Made on Blizzard-swept Road of Inspection
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- December 17 is the anniversary of the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 With the approach of the day, the DPRK people recollect with deep emotion the patriotic devotion made by Kim Jong Il to building a thriving country.
					
					 In January Juche 87 (1998), he made an inspection tour of several minor hydraulic power stations and many industrial establishments in Jagang Province despite of blizzard.
					
					 On January 16 alone, he went round the Pukchon Float Power Station and Janggang power stations No. 1 and 2 and Pukchon Power Station No. 3 in Kanggye City and 55 apartment buildings with electric heating in Janggang township.
					
					 From January 16 to 21, he gave ceaseless field guidance, covering at least 2 400 kilometers.
					
					 Then he went over a steep mountain pass to continue his field guidance to Hamhung, Tanchon, Songgang and Ranam in South and North Hamgyong provinces.
					
					 Indeed, his ceaseless inspection tour of different parts of the country was the one of great devotion to lay a firm foundation for building a thriving country.
					
					 Therefore, the DPRK people will always remember the immortal exploits he performed on the blizzard-swept road of field guidance.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Warmongers for Fabricating Aerial Information Group
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Warmongers for Fabricating Aerial Information Group
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet warmongers formed an aerial information group in charge of the "precision surveillance" on core military facilities of the DPRK. The puppet military claimed that this is to keep round-the-clock information surveillance posture in a bid to "detect the sign of nuclear and missile threat in advance". 
					 This proves that the south Korean puppet forces frightened by the DPRK's strategic position and considerably increased nuclear deterrence for self-defense are getting more frantic in the military confrontation while seeking their foolish ambition, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The formation of the group is the clear revelation of their attempt for adventurous preemptive attack which is getting pronounced with each passing day. 
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that this is the manifestation of their ambition of unpardonable heinous terrorism targeting the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 Traitors who seek the heinous terrorism will never go scot-free.
					
					 They should cool off their heads heated with war hysteria and be prudent. This is the only way out to avoid the merciless punishment.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Abe for Reversing Black and White
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Abe for Reversing Black and White
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Frightened by the recent successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15 by the DPRK, Japanese Prime Minister Abe said that Japan "would never pardon such a reckless action" and "keep itself on a high alert based on the firm Japan-U.S. alliance."
					 He also said that Japan is going to ask the UN to hold an emergency meeting in a bid to discuss the countermeasures and it is necessary for the international community to fully implement the resolutions of sanctions on the DPRK.
					
					 In this regard Rodong Sinmun Tuesday comments that it is sophism which could be uttered only by the brazen-faced and narrow-minded islanders.
					
					 The test-fire of Hwasong-15 was successfully carried out, not adversely affecting the security of neighboring countries, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 Abe must know it as he can hear and see.
					
					 One can clearly know that he gets frantic with the anti-DPRK moves.
					
					 Japan is busy building public opinion reversing black and white.
					
					 It is motivated by the cunning calculation to catch fish in troubled waters by zealously joining its American master in its anti-DPRK moves.
					
					 The ulterior intention of Japan is to become a military giant and attain the reinvasion ambition, persisting in the pro-U.S. policy.
					
					 Japan is watching for a chance of reinvasion while whetting the sword of aggression with the backing of its master. That is why Japan is talking about "outrage" and "alert posture," dancing to the tune of the master's moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 If Abe and other Japanese authorities persist in such reckless actions with the backing of the U.S., ignoring the changed reality, they will bring an irrevocable disaster to the archipelago.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Puppet Forces' Policy of Serving U.S. and Rejecting Fellow Countrymen
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Puppet Forces' Policy of Serving U.S. and Rejecting Fellow Countrymen
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces have gone more zealous than others after the great success in the test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15 of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Shortly ago, the puppet National Assembly adopted "a resolution denouncing missile launch and breach of Armistice Agreement (AA)" and the chief executive and its confidants talked on the phone with the U.S. and Japanese masters one after another, asking them for "deterrence of provocation through combined defense posture" and for "maximum pressure".
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday derides this as a meaningless act of those taken aback by the tremendous might of Juche Korea which was put on the highest level.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are top-class henchmen of the U.S. who have long been deprived of any face and qualifications to talk about "breach of AA", the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					  They nullified the AA out of their own accords, but now they have cooked up the "denunciation resolution" and have become vocal about "breach of AA". This is a shameless act reminding one of a thief crying "Stop Thief!" and only reveals the dirty nature for escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The pro-U.S. nature of the present south Korean authorities remind one of the predecessors who met destruction while trying to find a way-out in collusion with outsiders after failing to understand how the dignity and the sovereignty of the nation are defended and wherein lies the genuine might guaranteeing the peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should draw a due lesson from the end of the predecessors who were thrown overboard while persistently pursuing the anachronistic pro-U.S. one-sided policy with their back turned on the nation.
					
					 They should seriously approach the statement of the DPRK government which solemnly clarified that the new-type ICBM of the DPRK would not pose any threat to any country and region unless its interests are encroached upon, and make a proper option.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities, NA Denounced for Violation of Workers' Rights
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities, NA Denounced for Violation of Workers' Rights
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a rally winning the rights and law for trade unions, checking amendment of the Labor Standards Act and denouncing the evils-woven National Assembly outside the puppet NA on Dec. 8, according to the south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo.
					Speakers at the rally said the authorities styling themselves as a "candlelight government" do not solve the problem of back-to-work of sacked workers in the public sector but break the promise to get rid of part-time jobs. 
					
					They also condemned the NA for failing to adopt a bill for ensuring rights of activities of trade unions.
					
					Now the NA is getting frantic with the moves to pass the retrogressively revised "Labor Standards Act", they noted.
					
					They urged the NA to meet the demand of the workers for ensuring vital rights and stop the moves to retrogressively revise the "Labor Standards Act".

articles.title: Punishment of Lee Myung Bak Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Lee Myung Bak Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- South Korean people of different social standings reportedly launched a demonstration in Seoul on Dec. 9 in demand of the detainment and punishment of traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					 The "Commando for Seizing MB" and other organizations and citizens marched from the Kangnam Subway Station to the Hakdong Subway Station near the house of traitor Lee.
					
					 The "Commando for Seizing MB" declared to hold a candlelight rally on Dec. 16 to demand the detainment and punishment of traitor Lee.

articles.title: Internet Newspaper of Koreans in U.S. Hails DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-fire
articles.content:
Internet Newspaper of Koreans in U.S. Hails DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-fire
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- A commentary hailing the DPRK's successful ICBM test-fire was posted on Minjok Thongsin, an internet newspaper of Koreans in the U.S. on Dec. 5. It was contributed by Pak Tae Myong, a member of the newspaper's editorial board.
					 Noting the successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15 represents the actual power of the Korean nation and Juche Korea, the commentary said, and went on:
					
					 Today's victory is an inevitable one brought about thanks to the supreme leader of the DPRK.
					
					 He is the outstanding leader of all Koreans including overseas compatriots.
					
					 His matchless guts and pluck and uncompromising iron will just brought about such a great event of the Korean nation.
					
					 He is the sagacious leader of the Korean nation who provided the banner for the Korean people to continue their general advance without vacillation in the face of the hideous obstructions by the imperialists and reactionary forces.
					
					 We, overseas Koreans, should not forget that we could witness such a great historic moment of the Korean nation, thanks to the great people who didn't flinch even an inch from the road of their advance.
					
					 Now who will recognize the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state or not doesn't matter.
					
					 The world will follow the ray from the east with admiration at the great cause achieved by the Korean nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Indonesian Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Indonesian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Ristiyanto, secretary general of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, issued a statement on Nov. 24 to commemorate the 6th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 He said:
					
					 With his distinguished Songun politics HE Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power which no formidable enemy can ever provoke.
					
					 He was the genuine leader of the people and tender-hearted father who devoted his all to the people's happiness.
					
					 It would have been unthinkable without his tireless efforts that today the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a full-fledged nuclear power.
					
					 He made an immortal contribution to the development of the friendly relations between Indonesia and the DPRK and world peace and security.
					
					 His exploits for the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence will be always remembered by the Korean people and the world progressives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Inspection of Panmunjom Praised by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Inspection of Panmunjom Praised by British Organization
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- General Kim Jong Il's inspection of Panmunjom was a stern punishment to the enemies hell-bent on stifling socialism and immortal and gigantic act of the great commander as it instilled ever-victorious might and courage into the Korean people and world progressive people.
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy said this in an article titled "Inerasable trace at Panmunjom" posted on a website on Nov. 24 on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's inspection of Panmunjom.
					
					 The article noted that Kim Jong Il left a trace in history at Panmunjom during the period when the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces got more undisguised in their moves for igniting a war.
					
					 It said:
					
					 Looking back on his sacred trace at Panmunjom, the Korean people are recollecting the patriotic will of Kim Jong Il who paved the road for national reunification.
					
					 The dignity and sovereignty of the nation are firmly defended only when it holds the prominent leader possessed of matchless grit.
					
					 The world witnessed the majestic and bold appearance of the peerlessly and illustrious commander who does not fear any formidable enemies through Kim Jong Il's inspection of Panmunjom.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Test-Fire of ICBM Hwasong-15 Hailed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Test-Fire of ICBM Hwasong-15 Hailed Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Organizations of DR Congo and Switzerland made statements on Nov. 29 and 30 in congratulation of the DPRK's successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15.
					 The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo and the DR CongoÔºçKorea Friendship and Solidarity Association said in a joint statement:
					
					 We extend warm congratulations to the heroic Korean people who registered a great success in test-firing ICBM Hwasong-15 while rejecting the hostile forces' threat with persevering will.
					
					 The success of the Korean people is the brilliant victory of the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force advanced by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The U.S. should recognize the DPRK's strategic position and roll back its anachronistic hostile policy.
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said in a joint statement that the DPRK put an end to the history of aggression and nuclear threat by the U.S. imperialists and more firmly defended the people's peaceful life as it succeeded in the test-fire of ICBM.
					
					 Meanwhile, a Serbian personage warmly congratulated the DPRK upon its successful test-fire of ICBM on Nov. 30.
					
					 Marijan Kubik, international secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party, said in a statement that the DPRK's nuclear tests and test-fires of rockets are the exercise of the right to self-defence to guarantee the sovereign state's security.

articles.title: U.S. Re-listing of DPRK as "Sponsor of Terrorism" Rejected by Foreigners
articles.content:
U.S. Re-listing of DPRK as "Sponsor of Terrorism" Rejected by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Personages of Ethiopia and Belarus issued statements on Nov. 27 to denounce the U.S. for re-listing the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism".
					 Nigatu Dagnachew, chairman of the Ethiopia-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, said:
					
					 Why did the U.S. brand the DPRK, an independent country, as a "state sponsor of terrorism"?
					
					 This is because the U.S. behaving like "the emperor of the world" has suffered too bitter setbacks in the showdown with the DPRK.
					
					 Another reason is that it failed to bring the DPRK to its knees with any harsh sanctions and military threats.
					
					 The U.S. knows nothing about the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is not a country which yields to the U.S though it imposes sanctions, threats and blackmails and re-lists it as a "state sponsor of terrorism".
					
					 Sergei Zebyatikh, editor-in-chief of the Belarusian magazine Social Education, said:
					
					 The world knows well who the real state sponsor of terrorism is. It is none other than the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. behavior cannot be interpreted otherwise than a mean act of misleading the world attention to its crimes as it is the act like the guilty party filing the suit first.
					
					 The U.S. will be held accountable for its crimes anytime.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Bulgarian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Bulgarian Organization
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Anti-Japanese War Heroine Kim Jong Suk Will Live for Ever in the Hearts of Our People" was posted by the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on its website on Dec. 4 on the sixth anniversary of his demise and the centenary of her birth.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia en la 8a Conferencia de Industria Armamentista
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia en la 8a Conferencia de Industria Armamentista
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 11 en esta capital la 8a Conferencia de Industria Armamentista.
					El conclave hara balance de los exitos y las experiencias, alcanzados en la lucha por materializar la politica de industria armamentista del partido, y discutira los problemas de medidas para abrir la era dorada del desarrollo de la autoctona industria de defensa nacional y poner de pleno manifiesto el poderio invencible de Corea socialista, levantando en alto la bandera de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y de las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion Thae Jong Su, No Kwang Chol, Jang Chang Ha, Jon Il Ho, Hong Sung Mu, Hong Yong Chil, los presidentes de los comites provinciales del PTC, los contribuyentes al exitoso lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM tipo "Hwasong-15", asi como los cientificos, tecnicos, los benemeritos laborales y funcionarios de los sectores de la investigacion de ciencia de defensa nacional y la industria armamentista, quienes hicieron gran aporte al fortalecimiento del poderio de defensa del pais, y los funcionarios y trabajadores de las unidades concernientes.
					
					Cuando el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un salio a la tribuna, todos los participantes le acogieron calurosamente.
					
					En su informe, Thae Jong Su, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, recordo que la historia de la industria belica del pais es la revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y del PTC, y prosiguio:
					
					El Presidente, quien preparo tempranamente en las llamas de la revolucion antijaponesa la preciosa tradicion de la construccion de autoctona industria de defensa nacional, presento inmediatamente despues de la liberacion del pais la orientacion de construir su propia industria de defensa nacional y dirigio sabiamente la lucha por su realizacion estando en la fabrica de armas de Phyongchon antes que la Aceria de Kangson, aun en las situaciones complicadas de la construccion de nueva patria.
					
					Al considerar el fortalecimiento de fusil como asunto importantisimo del partido y la revolucion y linea vital de la construccion de la potencia socialista, el Dirigente trajo cambios radicales en el desarrollo de la autoctona industria de defensa nacional mediante su destacada idea e incansable direccion.
					
					Gracias a tener al Maximo Dirigente, la autoctona industria de defensa nacional acoge nueva era esplendido de su desarrollo.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente presento la linea estrategica de desarrollar paralelamente la construccion economica y de las fuerzas armadas nucleares y preparo la base juridica para consolidar las fuerzas armadas nucleares, hecho que sirvio de un punto de viraje para convertir la patria en la potencia nuclear sin rival y adelantar la victoria final en la confrontacion antiyanqui y en la construccion de la potencia socialista.
					
					El pleno exito obtenido en las dos pruebas de bomba H, ejecutadas con la decision estrategica del Maximo Dirigente, las milagrosas victorias de la "Revolucion 18 de Marzo", la "Revolucion 4 de Julio" y el 28 de julio y el gran triunfo del 29 de noviembre, constituyen jubilos nacionales y eventos historicos, que abrieron la era de cambios radicales del desarrollo de industria de defensa nacional y realizaron de modo brillante la aspiracion anhelosa del pueblo coreano por tener la poderosa fuerza de defensa nacional.
					
					El periodo, que data desde la septima conferencia hasta hoy, fue los dias llenos de victorias y glorias, en que se han confirmado la justeza y la vitalidad de la politica del PTC de registrar considerables saltos asombrosos y centuplicar por todos los medios la fuerza de autodefensa con las fuerzas armadas nucleares como su nucleo.
					
					Bajo la orientacion del CC del PTC, la industria de defensa nacional del pais ha venido avanzando rectamente por el unico camino indicado por el partido.
					
					En particular, el exitoso lanzamiento de prueba de nuevo ICBM tipo "Hwasong-15", capaz de golpear todo el territorio propio norteamericano y cargar la ojiva nuclear superpesada, recien desarrollado gracias a la audaz politica y decision estrategica del PTC, deviene una gran victoria de la nacion lograda en la lucha por cumplir brillantemente la gran causa historica del perfeccionamiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado y la de conversion del pais en la potencia coheteril, aspirado tanto por el pueblo coreano, y un gran acontecimiento a registrarse con letras mayusculas en los anales de la patria.
					
					Al finalizar, el informante presento la perspectiva y las tareas de la rama a fin de continuar la era prospera del desarrollo de la autoctona industria belica e intensificar por todos los medios el poderio de defensa nacional.
					
					Luego, hubo intervenciones.
					
					En las ocasiones se intercambiaron los exitos y las experiencias sobresalientes alcanzados en el pasado en la investigacion de ciencias de defensa nacional y la consolidacion del poderio de defensa nacional en acato a la politica de industria armamentista del partido, y se discutieron los remedios para producir a base de ellos los grandes saltos en el desarrollo de la autoctona industria de defensa nacional.
					
					Y fueron analizados y balanceados los defectos inherentes en las ramas de investigacion de ciencias de defensa nacional y la industria armamentista, y las lecciones.
					
					La conferencia continua.

articles.title: Representacion permanente coreana ante ONU denuncia al Consejo de Seguridad
articles.content:
Representacion permanente coreana ante ONU denuncia al Consejo de Seguridad 
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- La Representacion Permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la ONU hizo publico ayer un comunicado con respecto a que el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC fue sometido a la consideracion y discutido de manera coercitiva el mismo dia en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles volvieron a someter a la consideracion y discutieron este ano en el CS de la ONU el inexistente "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC, lo que constituye un acto que desprecia a la Carta de la ONU y las leyes internacionales y contraviene a la voluntad de la mayoria de los paises miembros de la ONU, condena el documento y prosigue:
					
					Lejos de observar su mision principal de mantener la paz y la seguridad internacionales, el CS de la ONU discutio de modo coercitivo el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC pese a la oposicion de no pocos paises miembros, lo cual evidencia el hecho de que ese organo internacional fue convertido en la marioneta de EE.UU. y lleva al suelo la confianza de la sociedad internacional sobre el CS de la ONU poniendo en relieve la inminencia de la reforma de este aparato.
					
					Deviene un sueno absurdo si EE.UU y otras fuerzas hostiles piensan en que podrian atentar a la RPDC mediante la discusion del "problema de DDHH" en el CS de la ONU.
					
					La RPDC no se asustara nunca ante tal farsa barata y condena rotundamente la reciente reunion calificandola de los ultimos esfuerzos de las fuerzas hostiles derrotadas en la confrontacion politico-militar de la RPDC, que se situa dignamente en la posicion de potencia nuclear.
					
					El pueblo coreano seguira consolidando mas el socialismo a estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares en que la dignidad del ser humano ha llegado al plano supremo.

articles.title: Llega la delegacion del Ministerio de Defensa de Rusia
articles.content:
Llega la delegacion del Ministerio de Defensa de Rusia
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Llego el dia 12 a esta capital la delegacion del Ministerio de Defensa de Rusia, encabezada por Victor Kalganov, subdirector del Centro de Mando de Defensa Nacional de la Federacion Rusa.

articles.title: Seleccion femenina de RPDC vence a su rival surcoreana
articles.content:
Seleccion femenina de RPDC vence a su rival surcoreana
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 11 la competencia entre las selecciones femeninas de la RPDC y el Sur de Corea del campeonato E-1 de la Federacion de las Asociaciones de Futbol del Este de Asia de 2017.
					En la ocasion, la futbolista de la RPDC Kim Yun Mi dio un gol con la cabezada a eso de 18 minutos. Por su resultado, la RPDC vencio a su rival por 1:0.
